           def admin

           def delete_game
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
              Game.find(params[:id]).destroy
        
      318. 
      
        
    318.

      319.

              redirect_to game_admin_path
        
      320.

           end
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
          
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
           def delete_all
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
              Game.all.each do |game|
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
                game.destroy
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
              end
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
              flash[:success] = "Games deleted"
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
              redirect_to game_admin_path
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
           end
        
      329.

          end

          	def multiplayer_start_game
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          		current_invite = GameInvitation.find_by_id(params["invite_id"])
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          		x = session["warden.user.user.key"]
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              	y = User.find(x[0])
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              	z = y[0]
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              	username = z["username"]
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              	if(username != current_invite.player1_username) && (username != current_invite.player2_username)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          			flash[:warning] = "You can only start a game if you have joined it."
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          			redirect_to invitations_screen_path
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          		end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          		#Get players
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          		player1 = User.find_by_username(current_invite.player1_username)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          		player2 = User.find_by_username(current_invite.player2_username)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          		#binding.pry
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          		#Check if players are currently in a game.
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          		if(player1["currentgame"].nil? && player2["currentgame"].nil?)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          			#Create Game
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          		    #Get character
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          		    player_character = Character.find_by_name(current_invite.player1_character)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          		    opponent_character = Character.find_by_name(current_invite.player2_character)
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          		    game_name = SecureRandom.base64()
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          		    player1["currentgame"] = game_name
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          		    player2["currentgame"] =  game_name
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          		    player1.save
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          		    player2.save
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          		    create_hash = {:game_name => game_name, :player1 => current_invite.player1_username, :player2 => current_invite.player2_username, :player1_character => current_invite.player1_character, :player2_character => current_invite.player2_character, :player1_message => "", :player2_message => "", :current_turn => 1, :player1_buff => "None", :player1_buff_start => 0, :player2_buff => "None", :player2_buff_start => 0, :player1_debuff => "None", :player1_debuff_start => 0, :player2_debuff => "None", :player2_debuff_start => 0, :p1_hp => player_character.max_hp, :p2_hp => opponent_character.max_hp, :p1_mp => player_character.max_mp, :p2_mp => opponent_character.max_mp, :p1_guard => false, :p2_guard => false, :game_over => false}
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          		    Game.create!(create_hash)
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          		    session[:current_game] = game_name
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
          		    
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          			#Delete this Invitation
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          			GameInvitation.destroy(current_invite)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          			#binding.pry
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          			redirect_to game_show_path
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          		else
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          			flash[:warning] = "One of the players is currently in a game. Both players must leave any current games before starting a new one. Please try again."
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          			redirect_to game_invitation_show_path(:invite =>params["invite_id"])
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          		end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          	end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          end
        
      199.

      628. 
      
        
    628. 
          
          
                    current_game.player2_buff_start = current_game.current_turn
        
      629. 
      
        
    629. 
          
          
                    current_game.p2_mp = current_game.p2_mp - 20
        
      630. 
      
        
    630. 
          
          
                  else
        
      631. 
      
        
    631. 
          2
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player2_character} doesn't have enough Mana to activate the power!"
        
      632. 
      
        
    632. 
          
          
                  end
        
      633. 
      
        
    633. 
          
          
                end
        
      634. 
      
        
    634. 
          
          
              end
        
      635. 
      
        
    635. 
          
          
          
        
      636. 
      
        
    636. 
          
          
              #Action 22: Summon
        
      637. 
      
        
    637. 
          151
          
              if(action_id == "22")
        
      638. 
      
        
    638. 
          8
          
                if(p1_turn)
        
      639. 
      
        
    639. 
          4
          
                  if(current_game.p1_mp >= 20)
        
      640. 
      
        
    640. 
          2
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player1_character} has summoned an ally!"
        
      641. 
      
        
    641. 
          2
          
                    current_game.player1_buff = "Summon"
        
      642. 
      
        
    642. 
          2
          
                    current_game.player1_buff_start = current_game.current_turn
        
      643. 
      
        
    643. 
          2
          
                    current_game.p1_mp = current_game.p1_mp - 20
        
      644. 
      
        
    644. 
          
          
                  else
        
      645. 
      
        
    645. 
          2
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player1_character} doesn't have enough Mana to activate the power!"
        
      646. 
      
        
    646. 
          
          
                  end
        
      647. 
      
        
    647. 
          
          
                else
        
      648. 
      
        
    648. 
          4
          
                  if(current_game.p2_mp >= 20)
        
      649. 
      
        
    649. 
          
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player2_character} has summoned an ally!"
        
      650. 
      
        
    650. 
          
          
                    current_game.player2_buff = "Summon"
        
      651. 
      
        
    651. 
          
          
                    current_game.player2_buff_start = current_game.current_turn
        
      652. 
      
        
    652. 
          
          
                    current_game.p2_mp = current_game.p2_mp - 20
        
      653. 
      
        
    653. 
          
          
                  else
        
      654. 
      
        
    654. 
          4
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player2_character} doesn't have enough Mana to activate the power!"
        
      655. 
      
        
    655. 
          
          
                  end
        
      656. 
      
        
    656. 
          
          
                end
        
      657. 
      
        
    657. 
          
          
              end
        
      658. 
      
        
    658. 
          
          
          
        
      659. 
      
        
    659. 
          
          
              #Action 23: Heal (Regain Health)
        
      660. 
      
        
    660. 
          151
          
              if(action_id == "23")
        
      661. 
      
        
    661. 
          
          
                health_regained = 5 + rand(10)
        
      662. 
      
        
    662. 
          
          
                if (p1_turn)
        
      663. 
      
        
    663. 
          
          
                  if (current_game.p1_mp >= 20)
        
      664. 
      
        
    664. 
          
          
                    current_game.p1_hp = current_game.p1_hp + health_regained
        
      665. 
      
        
    665. 
          
          
                    action_results = "#{active_character.name} heals, gaining #{health_regained} Hit Points."
        
      666. 
      
        
    666. 
          
          
                    if (current_game.p1_hp > active_character.max_hp)
        
      667. 
      
        
    667. 
          
          
                      current_game.p1_hp = active_character.max_hp
        
      668. 
      
        
    668. 
          
          
                    end
        
      669. 
      
        
    669. 
          
          
                    current_game.p1_mp = current_game.p1_mp - 20
        
      670. 
      
        
    670. 
          
          
                  else
        
      671. 
      
        
    671. 
          
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player1_character} doesn't have enough Mana to activate the power!"
        
      672. 
      
        
    672. 
          
          
                  end
        
      673. 
      
        
    673. 
          
          
          
        
      674. 
      
        
    674. 
          
          
                else
        
      675. 
      
        
    675. 
          
          
                  if (current_game.p2_mp >= 20)
        
      676. 
      
        
    676. 
          
          
                    current_game.p2_hp = current_game.p2_hp + health_regained
        
      677. 
      
        
    677. 
          
          
                    action_results = "#{active_character.name} heals, gaining #{health_regained} Hit Points."
        
      678. 
      
        
    678. 
          
          
                    if (current_game.p2_hp > active_character.max_hp)
        
      679. 
      
        
    679. 
          
          
                      current_game.p2_hp = active_character.max_hp
        
      680. 
      
        
    680. 
          
          
                    end
        
      681. 
      
        
    681. 
          
          
                    current_game.p2_mp = current_game.p2_mp - 20
        
      682. 
      
        
    682. 
          
          
                  else
        
      683. 
      
        
    683. 
          
          
                    action_results = "#{current_game.player2_character} doesn't have enough Mana to activate the power!"
        
      684. 
      
        
    684. 
          
          
                  end
        
      685. 
      
        
    685. 
          
          
                end
        
      686. 
      
        
    686. 
          
          
               
        
      687. 
      
        
    687. 
          
          
                current_game.save
        
      688. 
      
        
    688. 
          
          
                #action_results = Game::basic_attack(attack_bonus, defense_bonus, damage_bonus, armor_bonus, p1_turn, current_game)
        
      689. 
      
        
    689. 
          
          
              end
        
      690. 
      
        
    690. 
          
          
            	
        
      691. 
      
        
    691. 
          
          
            	#The Guard Needs to be removed after all other actions are complete.
        
      692. 
      
        
    692. 
          151
          
            	current_game.p1_guard = false
        
      693. 
      
        
    693. 
          151
          
            	current_game.p2_guard = false
        
      694. 
      
        
    694. 
          
          
          
        
      695. 
      
        
    695. 
          
          
            	#binding.pry
        
      696. 
      
        
    696. 
          
          
          
        
      697. 
      
        
    697. 
          
          
          	#The Guard action must be taken last so that it can affect the next action  	
        
      698. 
      
        
    698. 
          151
          
            	if(action_id == "2")
        
      699. 
      
        
    699. 
          4
          
            		turn = current_game.current_turn
        
      700. 
      
        
    700. 
          4
          
            		if (turn % 2 == 1)
        
      701. 
      
        
    701. 
          2
          
            			current_game.p1_guard = true
        
      702. 
      
        
    702. 
          2
          
            			action_results = "Guard Activated!"
        
      703. 
      
        
    703. 
          
          
            		else
        
      704. 
      
        
    704. 
          2
          
            			current_game.p2_guard = true
        
      705. 
      
        
    705. 
          2
          
            			action_results = "Guard Activated!"
        
      706. 
      
        
    706. 
          
          
            		end
        
      707. 
      
        
    707. 
          
          
            	end
        
      708. 
      
        
    708. 
          
          
          
        
      709. 
      
        
    709. 
          
          
            	#End of Turn Checks for Status etc.
        
      710. 
      
        
    710. 
          151
          
            	current_game.current_turn = current_game.current_turn + 1
        
      711. 
      
        
    711. 
          
          
          
        
      712. 
      
        
    712. 
          
          
            	#Check if Player 1 is Dead
        
      713. 
      
        
    713. 
          151
          
            	if (current_game.p1_hp <= 0)
        
      714. 
      
        
    714. 
          33
          
            		current_game.game_over = true
        
      715. 
      
        
    715. 
          33
          
            		win_results = "#{current_game.player1} Loses!"
        
      716. 
      
        
    716. 
          
          
            	end
        
      717. 
      
        
    717. 
          
          
            	#Check if Player 2 is dead
        
      718. 
      
        
    718. 
          151
          
            	if (current_game.p2_hp <= 0)
        
      719. 
      
        
    719. 
          
          
            		current_game.game_over = true
        
      720. 
      
        
    720. 
          
          
            		win_results = "#{current_game.player2} Loses!"
        
      721. 
      
        
    721. 
          
          
            	end
        
      722. 
      
        
    722. 
          
          
          
        
      723. 
      
        
    723. 
          151
          
            	current_game.save
        
      724. 
      
        
    724. 
          
          
          
        
      725. 
      
        
    725. 
          151
          
              results = "#{buff_results} \n #{summon_results} \n #{debuff_results} \n #{action_results} \n  #{win_results}"
        
      726. 
      
        
    726. 
          
          
          
        
      727. 
      
        
    727. 
          151
          
            	return results
        
      728. 
      
        
    728. 
          
          
          
        
      729. 
      
        
    729. 
          
          
            end
        
      730. 
      
        
    730. 
          
          
          
        
      731. 
      
        
    731. 
          1
          
            def Game::handle_debuff_effects(current_game, p1_turn, action_id)
        
      732. 
      
        
    732. 
          
          
          
        
      733. 
      
        
    733. 
          151
          
              if (p1_turn)
        
      734. 
      
        
    734. 
          
          
                #Handle Poison Status Effect
        
      735. 
      
        
    735. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Poison")
        
      736. 
      
        
    736. 
          
          
                  
        
      737. 
      
        
    737. 
          50
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      738. 
      
        
    738. 
          50
          
                  if duration > 5
        
      739. 
      
        
    739. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      740. 
      
        
    740. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      741. 
      
        
    741. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} has finally overcome the poison!"
        
      742. 
      
        
    742. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      743. 
      
        
    743. 
          
          
                  else
        
      744. 
      
        
    744. 
          49
          
                    poison_damage = 3 + rand(6)
        
      745. 
      
        
    745. 
          49
          
                    current_game.p1_hp = current_game.p1_hp - poison_damage
        
      746. 
      
        
    746. 
          49
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} has taken #{poison_damage} from the poison!"
        
      747. 
      
        
    747. 
          
          
                  end
        
      748. 
      
        
    748. 
          
          
          
        
      749. 
      
        
    749. 
          
          
                end
        
      750. 
      
        
    750. 
          
          
          
        
      751. 
      
        
    751. 
          
          
                #Handle Confusion Status Effect
        
      752. 
      
        
    752. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Confusion")
        
      753. 
      
        
    753. 
          
          
                  
        
      754. 
      
        
    754. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      755. 
      
        
    755. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      756. 
      
        
    756. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      757. 
      
        
    757. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      758. 
      
        
    758. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} is no longer confused!"
        
      759. 
      
        
    759. 
          
          
                  else
        
      760. 
      
        
    760. 
          1
          
                    c_rating = 1 + rand(10)
        
      761. 
      
        
    761. 
          1
          
                    if(c_rating < 2)
        
      762. 
      
        
    762. 
          
          
                      results = "#{current_game.player1_character} dances around like a lunatic."
        
      763. 
      
        
    763. 
          1
          
                    elsif (c_rating < 8)
        
      764. 
      
        
    764. 
          1
          
                      results = "Due to #{current_game.player1_character}'s Confusion they took a random action!"
        
      765. 
      
        
    765. 
          
          
                    else
        
      766. 
      
        
    766. 
          
          
                      results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s confusion didn't affect the action."
        
      767. 
      
        
    767. 
          
          
                    end
        
      768. 
      
        
    768. 
          
          
                  end
        
      769. 
      
        
    769. 
          
          
                end
        
      770. 
      
        
    770. 
          
          
          
        
      771. 
      
        
    771. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Silence")   
        
      772. 
      
        
    772. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      773. 
      
        
    773. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 4
        
      774. 
      
        
    774. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      775. 
      
        
    775. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      776. 
      
        
    776. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} is no longer silenced!"
        
      777. 
      
        
    777. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      778. 
      
        
    778. 
          
          
                  else
        
      779. 
      
        
    779. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} is silenced and unable to use special attacks!"
        
      780. 
      
        
    780. 
          
          
                  end
        
      781. 
      
        
    781. 
          
          
                end
        
      782. 
      
        
    782. 
          
          
          
        
      783. 
      
        
    783. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Mana Lock")   
        
      784. 
      
        
    784. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      785. 
      
        
    785. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      786. 
      
        
    786. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      787. 
      
        
    787. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      788. 
      
        
    788. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} has overcome the Mana Lock."
        
      789. 
      
        
    789. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      790. 
      
        
    790. 
          
          
                  else
        
      791. 
      
        
    791. 
          1
          
                    max_mp = Character.find_by_name(current_game.player1_character).max_mp
        
      792. 
      
        
    792. 
          1
          
                    mana_regained = max_mp / 10
        
      793. 
      
        
    793. 
          1
          
                    current_game.p1_mp = current_game.p1_mp - mana_regained
        
      794. 
      
        
    794. 
          1
          
                    if(current_game.p1_mp < 0)
        
      795. 
      
        
    795. 
          
          
                      current_game.p1_mp = 0
        
      796. 
      
        
    796. 
          
          
                    end
        
      797. 
      
        
    797. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character} has lost #{mana_regained} mana from the Mana Lock!"
        
      798. 
      
        
    798. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      799. 
      
        
    799. 
          
          
                  end
        
      800. 
      
        
    800. 
          
          
                end
        
      801. 
      
        
    801. 
          
          
          
        
      802. 
      
        
    802. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Attack DOWN")   
        
      803. 
      
        
    803. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      804. 
      
        
    804. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      805. 
      
        
    805. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      806. 
      
        
    806. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      807. 
      
        
    807. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s attack has returned to normal."
        
      808. 
      
        
    808. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      809. 
      
        
    809. 
          
          
                  else
        
      810. 
      
        
    810. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s' attack is weakened."
        
      811. 
      
        
    811. 
          
          
                  end
        
      812. 
      
        
    812. 
          
          
                end
        
      813. 
      
        
    813. 
          
          
          
        
      814. 
      
        
    814. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Defense DOWN")   
        
      815. 
      
        
    815. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      816. 
      
        
    816. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      817. 
      
        
    817. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      818. 
      
        
    818. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      819. 
      
        
    819. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s defense has returned to normal."
        
      820. 
      
        
    820. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      821. 
      
        
    821. 
          
          
                  else
        
      822. 
      
        
    822. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s' defense is weakened."
        
      823. 
      
        
    823. 
          
          
                  end
        
      824. 
      
        
    824. 
          
          
                end
        
      825. 
      
        
    825. 
          
          
          
        
      826. 
      
        
    826. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Power DOWN")   
        
      827. 
      
        
    827. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      828. 
      
        
    828. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      829. 
      
        
    829. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      830. 
      
        
    830. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      831. 
      
        
    831. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s power has returned to normal."
        
      832. 
      
        
    832. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      833. 
      
        
    833. 
          
          
                  else
        
      834. 
      
        
    834. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s' power is weakened."
        
      835. 
      
        
    835. 
          
          
                  end
        
      836. 
      
        
    836. 
          
          
                end
        
      837. 
      
        
    837. 
          
          
          
        
      838. 
      
        
    838. 
          78
          
                if (current_game.player1_debuff == "Armor DOWN")   
        
      839. 
      
        
    839. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player1_debuff_start
        
      840. 
      
        
    840. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      841. 
      
        
    841. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff = "None"
        
      842. 
      
        
    842. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_debuff_start = -50
        
      843. 
      
        
    843. 
          1

      844. 
      
        
    844. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      845. 
      
        
    845. 
          
          
                  else
        
      846.

          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player1_character}'s' armor is weakened."
        
      847.

                  end
        
      848. 
      
        
    848. 
          
          
                end
        
      849. 
      
        
    849. 
          
          
          
        
      850. 
      
        
    850. 
          
          
              else
        
      851. 
      
        
    851. 
          
          
                  #Handle Poison Status Effect
        
      852. 
      
        
    852. 
          73
          
                if (current_game.player2_debuff == "Poison")
        
      853. 
      
        
    853. 
          
          
                  
        
      854. 
      
        
    854. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player2_debuff_start
        
      855. 
      
        
    855. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 5
        
      856. 
      
        
    856. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_debuff = "None"
        
      857. 
      
        
    857. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_debuff_start = -50
        
      858. 
      
        
    858. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character} has finally overcome the poison!"
        
      859. 
      
        
    859. 
          
          
                  else
        
      860. 
      
        
    860. 
          1
          
                    poison_damage = 3 + rand(6)
        
      861. 
      
        
    861. 
          1
          
                    current_game.p2_hp = current_game.p2_hp - poison_damage
        
      862. 
      
        
    862. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character} has taken #{poison_damage} damage from the poison!"
        
      863. 
      
        
    863. 
          
          
                  end
        
      864. 
      
        
    864. 
          
          
          
        
      865. 
      
        
    865. 
          
          
                end
        
      866. 
      
        
    866. 
          
          
          
        
      867. 
      
        
    867. 
          
          
                #Handle Confusion Status Effect
        
      868. 
      
        
    868. 
          73
          
                if (current_game.player2_debuff == "Confusion")
        
      869. 
      
        
    869. 
          2
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player2_debuff_start
        
      870. 
      
        
    870. 
          2
          
                  if duration > 5
        
      871. 
      
        
    871. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_debuff = "None"
        
      872. 
      
        
    872. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_debuff_start = -50
        
      873. 
      
        
    873. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character} is no longer confused!"
        
      874. 
      
        
    874. 
          
          
                  else
        
      875. 
      
        
    875. 
          1
          
                    c_rating = 1 + rand(10)
        
      876. 
      
        
    876. 
          1
          
                    if(c_rating < 2)
        
      877. 
      
        
    877. 
          
          
                      results = "#{current_game.player2_character} dances around like a lunatic."
        
      878. 
      
        
    878. 
          1
          
                    elsif (c_rating < 8)
        
      879. 
      
        
    879. 
          1
          
                      results = "Due to #{current_game.player2_character}'s Confusion they took a random action!"
        
      880. 
      
        
    880. 
          
          
                    else
        
      881. 
      
        
    881. 
          
          
                      results = "#{current_game.player2_character}'s confusion didn't affect the action."
        
      882.

            def Game::handle_buff_effects(current_game, p1_turn)

          78

      975. 
      
        
    975. 
          3

    976. 
          3
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      977. 
      
        
    977. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player1_buff = "None"
        
      978. 
      
        
    978.

                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character}'s' armor is strengthened."
        
      1101. 
      
        
    1101. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1102. 
      
        
    1102. 
          
          
                end
        
      1103. 
      
        
    1103. 
          
          
          
        
      1104. 
      
        
    1104. 
          73
          
                if (current_game.player2_buff == "Mana Regeneration")   
        
      1105. 
      
        
    1105. 
          3
          
                  duration = current_game.current_turn - current_game.player2_buff_start
        
      1106. 
      
        
    1106. 
          3
          
                  if duration > 6
        
      1107. 
      
        
    1107. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_buff = "None"
        
      1108. 
      
        
    1108. 
          1
          
                    current_game.player2_buff_start = -50
        
      1109. 
      
        
    1109. 
          1
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character} has lost their Mana Regeneration."
        
      1110. 
      
        
    1110. 
          1
          
                    current_game.save
        
      1111. 
      
        
    1111. 
          
          
                  else
        
      1112. 
      
        
    1112. 
          2
          
                    max_mp = Character.find_by_name(current_game.player2_character).max_mp
        
      1113. 
      
        
    1113. 
          2
          
                    mana_regained = max_mp / 10
        
      1114. 
      
        
    1114. 
          2
          
                    current_game.p2_mp = current_game.p2_mp + mana_regained
        
      1115. 
      
        
    1115. 
          2
          
                    if(current_game.p2_mp > max_mp)
        
      1116. 
      
        
    1116. 
          1
          
                      current_game.p2_mp = max_mp
        
      1117. 
      
        
    1117. 
          
          
                    end
        
      1118. 
      
        
    1118. 
          2
          
                    results = "#{current_game.player2_character} has regained #{mana_regained} mana."
        
      1119. 
      
        
    1119. 
          2
          
                    current_game.save
        
      1120. 
      
        
    1120.

      1121. 
      
        
    1121.

      1122.

    1123.

      1124.

      1125. 
      
        
    1125. 
          4
          
                  if duration > 2
        
      1126.

          4

            def Game::summon_handler(defense_bonus, armor_bonus, p1_turn, current_game)

            def Game::basic_attack(attack_bonus, defense_bonus, power_bonus, armor_bonus, p1_turn, current_game)
        
      1176. 
      
        
    1176. 
          
          
          
        
      1177. 
      
        
    1177. 
          
          
            	#Make Attack Roll
        
      1178. 
      
        
    1178. 
          83
          
            	attack_roll = 1 + rand(20) + attack_bonus
        
      1179. 
      
        
    1179. 
          
          
          
        
      1180. 
      
        
    1180. 
          
          
            	#Check for Guarding
        
      1181. 
      
        
    1181. 
          83
          
            	if(p1_turn)
        
      1182. 
      
        
    1182. 
          49
          
            		if(current_game.p2_guard == "t")
        
      1183. 
      
        
    1183. 
          1
          
            			defense_bonus = defense_bonus + 3
        
      1184. 
      
        
    1184. 
          1
          
            			armor_bonus = armor_bonus + 3
        
      1185. 
      
        
    1185. 
          
          
            		end
        
      1186. 
      
        
    1186. 
          
          
            	else
        
      1187. 
      
        
    1187. 
          34
          
            		if(current_game.p1_guard == "t")
        
      1188. 
      
        
    1188. 
          
          
            			defense_bonus = defense_bonus + 3
        
      1189. 
      
        
    1189. 
          
          
            			armor_bonus = armor_bonus + 3
        
      1190. 
      
        
    1190. 
          
          
            		end
        
      1191. 
      
        
    1191. 
          
          
            	end
        
      1192. 
      
        
    1192. 
          
          
          
        
      1193. 
      
        
    1193. 
          
          
            	#binding.pry
        
      1194. 
      
        
    1194. 
          
          
          
        
      1195. 
      
        
    1195. 
          
          
            	#Check if hit
        
      1196. 
      
        
    1196. 
          83
          
            	if(attack_roll > 10 + defense_bonus)
        
      1197. 
      
        
    1197. 
          
          
            		#Determine Damage
        
      1198. 
      
        
    1198. 
          40
          
            		damage = 2 + rand(10) + power_bonus - armor_bonus
        
      1199. 
      
        
    1199. 
          40
          
            		if damage < 0
        
      1200. 
      
        
    1200. 
          
          
            			damage = 0
        
      1201. 
      
        
    1201. 
          
          
            		end
        
      1202. 
      
        
    1202. 
          40
          
                if(p1_turn)
        
      1203. 
      
        
    1203. 
          22
          
                  if current_game.player1_buff == "Charge"
        
      1204. 
      
        
    1204. 
          1
          
                    damage = damage * 2
        
      1205. 
      
        
    1205. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1206. 
      
        
    1206. 
          
          
                else
        
      1207. 
      
        
    1207. 
          18
          
                  if current_game.player2_buff == "Charge"
        
      1208. 
      
        
    1208. 
          
          
                    damage = damage * 2
        
      1209. 
      
        
    1209. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1210. 
      
        
    1210. 
          
          
                end
        
      1211. 
      
        
    1211. 
          
          
            		#Apply damage
        
      1212. 
      
        
    1212. 
          40
          
            		if(p1_turn)
        
      1213. 
      
        
    1213. 
          22
          
            		   current_game.p2_hp = current_game.p2_hp - damage
        
      1214. 
      
        
    1214. 
          
          
            		else
        
      1215. 
      
        
    1215. 
          18
          
            		   current_game.p1_hp = current_game.p1_hp - damage
        
      1216. 
      
        
    1216. 
          
          
            		end
        
      1217. 
      
        
    1217. 
          40
          
            		results = "Attack Successful! #{damage} damage dealt!"
        
      1218. 
      
        
    1218. 
          
          
            	else
        
      1219. 
      
        
    1219. 
          43
          
            		results = "Attack Failed! No damage dealt."
        
      1220. 
      
        
    1220. 
          
          
            	end
        
      1221. 
      
        
    1221. 
          
          
            	#binding.pry
        
      1222. 
      
        
    1222. 
          83
          
            	current_game.save
        
      1223. 
      
        
    1223. 
          83
          
            	return results
        
      1224. 
      
        
    1224. 
          
          
            end
        
      1225. 
      
        
    1225. 
          
          
          
        
      1226. 
      
        
    1226. 
          1
          
            def Game::summon_basic_attack(attack_bonus, defense_bonus, power_bonus, armor_bonus, p1_turn, current_game)
        
      1227. 
      
        
    1227. 
          
          
          
        
      1228. 
      
        
    1228. 
          
          
              #Get Characters
        
      1229. 
      
        
    1229. 
          1
          
              player1_character = Character.find_by_name(current_game.player1_character)
        
      1230. 
      
        
    1230. 
          1
          
              player2_character = Character.find_by_name(current_game.player2_character)
        
      1231. 
      
        
    1231. 
          
          
              #Make Attack Roll
        
      1232. 
      
        
    1232. 
          1
          
              attack_roll = 1 + rand(20) + attack_bonus
        
      1233. 
      
        
    1233. 
          
          
          
        
      1234. 
      
        
    1234. 
          
          
              #Check for Guarding
        
      1235. 
      
        
    1235. 
          1
          
              if(p1_turn)
        
      1236. 
      
        
    1236. 
          1
          
                if(current_game.p2_guard == "t")
        
      1237. 
      
        
    1237. 
          
          
                  defense_bonus = defense_bonus + 3
        
      1238. 
      
        
    1238. 
          
          
                  armor_bonus = armor_bonus + 3
        
      1239. 
      
        
    1239. 
          
          
                end
        
      1240. 
      
        
    1240. 
          
          
              else
        
      1241. 
      
        
    1241. 
          
          
                if(current_game.p1_guard == "t")
        
      1242. 
      
        
    1242. 
          
          
                  defense_bonus = defense_bonus + 3
        
      1243. 
      
        
    1243. 
          
          
                  armor_bonus = armor_bonus + 3
        
      1244. 
      
        
    1244. 
          
          
                end
        
      1245. 
      
        
    1245. 
          
          
              end
        
      1246. 
      
        
    1246. 
          
          
          
        
      1247. 
      
        
    1247. 
          
          
              #binding.pry
        
      1248. 
      
        
    1248. 
          
          
          
        
      1249. 
      
        
    1249. 
          
          
              #Check if hit
        
      1250. 
      
        
    1250. 
          1
          
              if(attack_roll > 10 + defense_bonus)
        
      1251. 
      
        
    1251. 
          
          
                #Determine Damage
        
      1252. 
      
        
    1252. 
          1
          
                damage = 2 + rand(10) + power_bonus - armor_bonus
        
      1253. 
      
        
    1253. 
          1
          
                if damage < 0
        
      1254. 
      
        
    1254. 
          
          
                  damage = 0
        
      1255. 
      
        
    1255. 
          
          
                end
        
      1256. 
      
        
    1256. 
          
          
                #Apply damage
        
      1257. 
      
        
    1257. 
          1
          
                if(p1_turn)
        
      1258. 
      
        
    1258. 
          1
          
                   current_game.p2_hp = current_game.p2_hp - damage
        
      1259. 
      
        
    1259. 
          1
          
                   results = "#{player1_character.summon_attack} The Summon's Attack was Successful! #{damage} damage dealt!"
        
      1260. 
      
        
    1260. 
          
          
                else
        
      1261. 
      
        
    1261. 
          
          
                   current_game.p1_hp = current_game.p1_hp - damage
        
      1262. 
      
        
    1262. 
          
          
                   results = "#{player2_character.summon_attack} The Summon's Attack was Successful! #{damage} damage dealt!"
        
      1263. 
      
        
    1263. 
          
          
                end
        
      1264. 
      
        
    1264. 
          
          
                
        
      1265. 
      
        
    1265. 
          
          
              else
        
      1266. 
      
        
    1266. 
          
          
                results = "The Summon's Attack Failed! No damage dealt."
        
      1267. 
      
        
    1267. 
          
          
              end
        
      1268. 
      
        
    1268. 
          
          
              #binding.pry
        
      1269. 
      
        
    1269. 
          1
          
              current_game.save
        
      1270. 
      
        
    1270. 
          1
          
              return results
        
      1271. 
      
        
    1271. 
          
          
            end
        
      1272. 
      
        
    1272. 
          
          
          
        
      1273. 
      
        
    1273. 
          1
          
            def Game::get_MP_cost(action_id)
        
      1274.

             if action_id == 4
        
      1275. 
      
        
    1275. 
          2

      1276.

      1277.

           def Game::get_ability_info (action_id, character_name)
        
      1318. 
      
        
    1318. 
          9
          
            current_character = Character.find_by_name(character_name)
        
      1319. 
      
        
    1319. 
          9
          
            answer = Hash.new()
        
      1320. 
      
        
    1320. 
          
          
          
        
      1321. 
      
        
    1321. 
          
          
            #binding.pry
        
      1322. 
      
        
    1322. 
          
          
          
        
      1323. 
      
        
    1323. 
          9
          
            if "#{current_character.action_1_id}" == "#{action_id}"
        
      1324. 
      
        
    1324. 
          1
          
              answer = {"ability_name" => current_character.action_1_name, "ability_flavor" => current_character.action_1_flavor}
        
      1325. 
      
        
    1325. 
          1
          
              return answer
        
      1326. 
      
        
    1326. 
          
          
            end
        
      1327. 
      
        
    1327. 
          
          
             
        
      1328. 
      
        
    1328. 
          8
          
            if "#{current_character.action_2_id}" == "#{action_id}"
        
      1329. 
      
        
    1329. 
          1
          
              answer = {"ability_name" => current_character.action_2_name, "ability_flavor" => current_character.action_2_flavor}
        
      1330. 
      
        
    1330. 
          1
          
              return answer
        
      1331. 
      
        
    1331. 
          
          
            end
        
      1332. 
      
        
    1332. 
          
          
          
        
      1333. 
      
        
    1333. 
          7
          
            if "#{current_character.action_3_id}" == "#{action_id}"
        
      1334. 
      
        
    1334. 
          1

      1335. 
      
        
    1335. 
          1
          
              return answer
        
      1336. 
      
        
    1336. 
          
          
            end
        
      1337. 
      
        
    1337. 
          
          
          
        
      1338. 
      
        
    1338. 
          6
          
            if "#{current_character.action_4_id}" == "#{action_id}"
        
      1339. 
      
        
    1339. 
          1

      1340.

              return answer
        
      1341.

      20.

            # :mongoid (bson_ext recommended) by default. Other ORMs may be

      23.
